column18: Q1- Overall how would your company rate the quality of IFC advisory services received?
Q2-To what extent did the APRE program interventions address the needs of your firm?
Q3 -Would you recommend IFC to other companies as partner to engage in similar cases?)
Q4 -	To what extent do you think the program has contributed to the agri-processing sector transformation to move towards resource efficiency practices? )
Q5 -	To what extent do you think the program has contributed to the development of a market for resource efficiency systems and infrastructure in South Africa?)
Q6 -	Was the program successful in building capacity and increasing awareness on the water and energy efficiency measures among agri-processing companies and sector aggregators?)
Q7 -Have you adopted any additional measures that were not listed in IFC’s recommendation ? [Note to the interviewer: Check footnote for the list of firms to be asked this question)
Q8 -Did you RECEIVE new information on resource efficiency (water/energy efficiency) from the IFC project?)
Q9 -Did you utilize new information from the IFC project?)
Q10 - Have you made use of the resource efficiency self assessment tool?
Q11 -Did the stakeholders appreciate the IFC/APRE project? Would they continue with the same kind of interventions?
